cyclone.name: JOSE
cyclone.current_location: about 635 mi ESE of the northern Leeward Islands
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest toward the northern Leeward Islands, then forecast to turn northwest and north over the open Atlantic east of the Bahamas

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch – Antigua, Barbuda, Anguilla, Sint Maarten, St. Martin; Tropical Storm Watch – Montserrat, St. Kitts, Nevis, Saba, St. Eustatius
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning – Antigua, Barbuda, Anguilla
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands from Dominica northward, especially Antigua, Barbuda, Anguilla, and nearby isles
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤19%) of tropical-storm-force winds; peak gusts generally <40 mph possible late Sat night–Sun
weather_observation.storm_surge: None significant expected for San Juan given track north of the island
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands could deliver 1–3 inches of rain beginning late Saturday, locally higher in squalls
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along north-facing beaches beginning Saturday
